A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One word filled my thoughts as the credits scrolled by\, disappointment. This movie was terrible\, from every conceivable perspective. From a plot and story perspective\, from a character development perspective\, from a source material perspective and so on. I had bought two screenings in advance when tickets went on sale. One for myself\, and a set for me and my kids. It was a harrowing thing to know I had to watch it a second time after the first\, but I had been told that people who saw it a second time liked it more. I didn't. It made it worse.\n\nIn fact\, the more I thought about the movie\, the more I hated it. I'd like to go into great detail on this\, but that may have to wait another day.
